title: Dark Fantasy Music Pack
description: Step into a realm where shadows whisper secrets and ancient powers stir.
longDescription:
Step into a realm where shadows whisper secrets and ancient powers stir. The Dark Fantasy Music Pack immerses you in a world of dark enchantment and eerie beauty, perfect for game developers, filmmakers, and storytellers looking to enhance their projects with atmospheric and evocative soundscapes.


Music Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-7XM5Pv2BLc


Unleash the power of darkness and let your audience lose themselves in the enchanting and perilous world of your creation with the Dark Fantasy Music Pack. Dive into the depths of fantasy and bring your stories to life with music that speaks to the soul.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Haunting Melodies: Each track is meticulously composed to evoke a sense of mystery and foreboding, with haunting melodies that linger in the mind long after the music fades.


  • Rich Soundscapes: Layered with intricate soundscapes, this pack transports you to forgotten realms, cursed forests, and ancient ruins, each piece telling its own dark tale.


  • Diverse Instrumentation: From brooding orchestral arrangements and somber piano pieces to eerie choral chants and otherworldly electronic sounds, the variety ensures that you'll find the perfect track for every scene.


  • High-Quality Production: Professionally mixed and mastered, each track is ready to be integrated seamlessly into your project, enhancing the overall atmosphere and emotional impact.


  • Versatile Use: Ideal for fantasy RPGs, horror games, dark fantasy films, gothic literature adaptations, and more. Whether you're building tension, setting a melancholic mood, or crafting an epic battle scene, this pack has you covered.


Number of Audio Wavs:10

Number of Audio Cues:10

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: (No)

Minutes of audio provided:25:32

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)
